price: Nokorԑ sε, Yakyerε no ͻkwan no;- Deε ͻfa so a ɔbɛyi (Nyankopͻn) ayε anaa deε ͻfa so a ɔbɛyi (Nyankopͻn) boniayε.
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
